snippet: LEAD: The American automotive industry must overcome vast technological hurdles and what it sees as an unreasonably tight timetable before it can provide vehicles that meet the air-quality standards imposed on Friday by regional officials in South...
lead_paragraph: LEAD: The American automotive industry must overcome vast technological hurdles and what it sees as an unreasonably tight timetable before it can provide vehicles that meet the air-quality standards imposed on Friday by regional officials in Southern California.

headline.main: Car Industry Protests California Antipollution Plan

byline.original: By DORON P. LEVIN, Special to the New York Times
